alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:40PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Converse County through 115 PM MDT... At 1239 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Rolling Hills, or 26 miles northwest of Douglas, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Converse County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
